page.title: 14A Day In The Life Of Susan
page.content: When I got up I felt very tired and didn't want to go to school, but I had to so I got dressed then went down for some toast for breakfast.After breakfast I had a wash and set off for school. On the way to school I was thinking about all my friends who I hadn't seen for a while because it was half-term. Eventually, I arrived at school but I was late because the bell had already gone and all the girls were inside, so I ran across the playground and went into school.As I went inside, I felt a bit strange at first because it was the first day back.When I went to my peg, I saw all my friends so I got out my schoolbooks and went into class with them.As I walked into class, the room seemed very bare and empty because the pictures had gone. The first lesson
